subject: Computers and the Internet
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: The two-time world champion Fernando Alonso and the directors of some of the top Formula One teams condemned racist messages on a Spanish Web site directed at the points leader, Lewis Hamilton of the McLaren team.
snippet: The two-time world champion Fernando Alonso and the directors of some of the top Formula One teams condemned racist messages on a Spanish Web site directed at the points leader, Lewis Hamilton of the McLaren team.
